prompts: Create a water/ground type Pokemon that excels in both aquatic and terrestrial combat.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with large fins and a powerful tail, ready for battle.
Imagine a Pokemon with a blue and orange color scheme, known for its strength and resilience.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands and has both swimming and land abilities.
Generate a large, amphibious creature with a rugged appearance and a fierce demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that can adapt to both forest and urban environments, showcasing versatility.
Give me a final evolution Pokemon that embodies determination and powerful aquatic moves.
